TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckedListBox/CheckedItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 將已選取項目的集合 (包括處於不定狀態的項目) 封裝至 控制項中。

span.span: Encapsulates the collection of checked items, including items in an indeterminate state, in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取的項目集合是中的所有項目子集控制項等控制項，它只包含這些項目處於已核取或是不定狀態。The checked items collection is a subset of all items in the control; it contains only those items that are in a checked or indeterminate state. 下表是控制項 （控制項中包含的所有項目） 中項目的索引集合的範例。The following table is an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control). |索引Index|項目Item|核取狀態Check State| |-----------|----------|-----------------| |00|object 1object 1|| |11|物件 2object 2|| |22|物件 3object 3|| |33|物件 4object 4|| |44|物件 5object 5|| 根據上一個範例下, 表顯示選取項目的索引的集合。Based on the previous example, the following table shows the indexed collection of the checked items. |索引Index|項目Item| |-----------|----------| |00|物件 2object 2| |11|物件 4object 4| |22|物件 5object 5| 類別有兩個成員，可讓您存取預存的索引，屬性和方法。The class has two members that allow you to access the stored indexes, the property and the method. 根據上述範例中，呼叫參數值為 1 的屬性會傳回物件 4。Based on the previous example, a call to the property with a parameter value of 1 returns object 4. 呼叫4 會傳回物件的參數值為 1。A call to with a parameter of object 4 returns a value of 1. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉中的選取項目查看項目檢查狀態項目為。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 此範例示範如何使用方法，以設定項目的核取狀態。The example demonstrates using the method to set the check state of an item. 此範例也示範如何使用屬性來取得，而屬性來取得。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 第一個迴圈會使用方法來取得的每個選取的項目，給定項目的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二個迴圈也會使用，但是會使用方法來擷取項目的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: Determines whether the specified item is located in the collection.

returns.span: 如果項目在集合中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if item is in the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會判斷將物件從集合處於集合。This method determines if an object from the collection is in the collection.

Public Sub CopyTo (dest As Array, index As Integer)

span.span: The destination array.

param.name: index
param.span: dest 中以零起始的相對索引，即開始複製的位置。

span.span: The zero-based relative index in dest at which copying begins.

summary.span: 將整個集合複製到現有陣列中的指定位置。

span.span: Copies the entire collection into an existing array at a specified location within the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來結合成單一陣列的多個集合從選取的索引。You can use this method to combine the selected indexes from multiple collections into a single array.

span.span: is .
is multidimensional.
is less than zero.

exception.span: 來源 中的元素數目大於從索引至目的端 結尾的可用空間。

span.span: The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination .

exception.span: 來源 的類型無法自動轉換成目的 的類型。

span.span: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination .

Public Function IndexOf (item As Object) As Integer

param.name: item
param.span: 您想要擷取其索引的物件。

span.span: The object whose index you want to retrieve.

param.span: 這個物件必須屬於已選取項目集合。

span.span: This object must belong to the checked items collection.

summary.span: 傳回已選取項目集合內的索引。

span.span: Returns an index into the collection of checked items.

returns.span: 已選取項目集合中物件的索引，或者為 –1 (如果物件不在集合之中)。

span.span: The index of the object in the checked item collection or -1 if the object is not in the collection.

returns.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別概觀中的範例。

span.span: For more information, see the examples in the class overview.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合是在物件子集集合，表示已核取項目。The collection is a subset of the objects in the collection, representing only items that are checked. 這個集合會以遞增順序排序。This collection is ordered in ascending order.
